Events and trends
* 1048 BCâMedon, King of Athens, dies after a reign of 20 years and is succeeded

* 1046 BCâFollowing the Battle of Muye, King Wu of Zhou overthrows the Shang
  Dynasty Chinese King Di Xin and founds the Zhou Dynasty (1046 BCâ256 BC).
* 1044 BCâOn the death of Smendes I, king of Egypt, he is succeeded by two co-
  regents, Psusennes I and Neferkare Amenemnisu. *1041 BCâSome sources propose
